title.native: ハズレ枠の【状態異常スキル】で最強になった俺がすべてを蹂躙するまで
title.romaji: Hazure Waku no [Joutai Ijou Skill] de Saikyou ni Natta Ore ga Subete wo Juurin Suru made
title.english: Failure Frame: I Became the Strongest and Annihilated Everything with Low-Level Spells

description:
Touka always faded into the background at school. And when he’s summoned to another world with his classmates, that still doesn’t change! They all acquire top-rank skills, except Touka, who’s deemed a failure and cast to ancient ruins by the goddess Vicius. Turns out, his low-rank skills may not be so useless after all. Now, he seeks revenge against the goddess, and his true nature is revealed.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Fugitive
tags.description: Prominently features a character evading capture by an individual or organization.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/福田道生)

Originating from [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/). Debuted as a director on [Hyakko](https://anilist.co/anime/4550/).
_Note: Not to be confused with the [mangaka](https://anilist.co/staff/256771/)._

**Alma Mater:** Liverpool Institute for Performing Arts (BA Music)

[Website](https://tatsumusic.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tatsu_saiki) | [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/tatsuyan)

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/OralJOE)** | **[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/oraltakuya/)** | **[Tumblr](https://oraljoe.tumblr.com/)**

**Takuya Yamanaka** is a Japanese musician, singer, guitarist, lyricist and composer. He is the vocalist and guitarist of rock-band [THE ORAL CIGARETTES](https://anilist.co/staff/120853/THE-ORAL-CIGARETTES). He has two dogs named Miso (みそ) and Sesame (ごま).

__[Website](https://chogakusei.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tyougakusei) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/ChogakuseiOfficial) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/chogakusei/) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@chogakusei)__

Chogakusei is a Japanese singer/utaite. He has been active on NicoNico since late 2011 and started uploading covers at age of 11.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/OralJOE)** | **[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/oraltakuya/)** | **[Tumblr](https://oraljoe.tumblr.com/)**

**Takuya Yamanaka** is a Japanese musician, singer, guitarist, lyricist and composer. He is the vocalist and guitarist of rock-band [THE ORAL CIGARETTES](https://anilist.co/staff/120853/THE-ORAL-CIGARETTES). He has two dogs named Miso (みそ) and Sesame (ごま).
